revised_title: Exploring Germline and Somatic Mutation Events at the Hypervariable Mouse Minisatellite Locus Ms6-hm
tldr: This study investigates the spontaneous mutation rate at the hypervariable mouse minisatellite locus Ms6-hm and analyzes germline and somatic mutation events. The mouse minisatellite locus Ms6-hm has a germline mutation rate of 2.5% per gamete, making it one of the most unstable loci in the mouse genome. The research also explores the DNA sequence flanking the locus and the mechanisms involved in new-length allele generation.
